reviews.text:
The Antigua Casa Figueras or "Old House of Figueras”, is a shop on La Rambla that stands out for it Catalan Modernist facade. The building some some truly opulent displays this architecture such as the elaborate mosaic of floral motifs, the stained glass windows that look like candied treats good enough to eat, the textured relief sculpture of a woman harvesting wheat on the corner and the coup de fount wrought iron that decorates the frame the doors.

The shop also sells sumptuous treats that are tasty too!
Very unique and original building. It is in the heart of the city so you can see it while walking along la rambla

This place is right on La Rambla. My mom and I came in to have dessert and coffee and it was great. I had the dessert that was shaped like red lips and that was truly delicious. Do not hesitate to get that dessert!! I gave this place 4 stars only because it was a little difficult to get seating and to be noticed by the waiters, but I would say it’s worth the wait.
